atk-abh03a20:2_0: 418. Idāni vimuttikathā nāma hoti. Tattha vipassanā, maggo, phalaṁ,
atk-abh03a20:2_3: tadaṅgavimuttibhāvena vā vimuttattā vimuttiñāṇaṁ. Maggo samucchedavimutti,
atk-abh03a20:2_6: Evaṁ catubbidhe vimuttiñāṇe nippariyāyena phalañāṇameva vimutti.
atk-abh03a20:2_8: Tasmā ‘‘idaṁ nāma vimuttiñāṇaṁ vimutta’’nti avatvā aviseseneva ‘‘vimuttiñāṇaṁ vimutta’’nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a20:2_9: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a20:2_10: Puna yaṁkiñcīti puṭṭho paccavekkhaṇādīni sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:2_11: Paṭipannassāti puṭṭho maggañāṇassa anāsavataṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a20:2_12: Yasmā pana taṁ sotāpannassa phale ṭhitassa ñāṇaṁ na hoti,
atk-abh03a20:2_13: tasmā vimuttaṁ nāma na hotīti codanatthaṁ puna sakavādī sotāpannassātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:5_1: Tattha yasmā ānandattherādayo sekhā ‘‘uḷāro bhagavā’’tiādinā nayena asekhe jānanti,
atk-abh03a20:5_2: tasmā ‘‘sekhassa asekhañāṇaṁ atthī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a20:5_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:5_4: Jānāti passatīti idaṁ attanā adhigatassa jānanavasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:5_5: Gotrabhunotiādi heṭṭhimāya bhūmiyaṁ ṭhitassa uparūpariñāṇassa abhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:5_6: Nanu āyasmā ānando sekho ‘‘uḷāro bhagavā’’ti jānātīti paravādī asekhe bhagavati pavattattā taṁ asekhañāṇanti icchati, na panetaṁ asekhaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:5_7: Tasmā evaṁ patiṭṭhāpitāpi laddhi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a20:8_3: tassa taṁ ñāṇaṁ viparītañāṇa’’nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ,
atk-abh03a20:8_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:8_5: Pathaviṁ nissāya uppannanimittañhi na pathavīyeva, tatra cāyaṁ pathavīsaññī.
atk-abh03a20:8_7: Tato sakavādī ‘‘lakkhaṇapathavīpi sasambhārapathavīpi nimittapathavīpi pathavīdevatāpi sabbā pathavīyeva,
atk-abh03a20:8_8: tāsu pathavīti ñāṇaṁ viparītaṁ na hoti.
atk-abh03a20:8_10: Kiṁ te idaṁ etesu aññatara’’nti codetuṁ anicce niccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:9_3: Sabbeva pathavīti sabbaṁ taṁ pathavīkasiṇaṁ lakkhaṇapathavīyeva hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a20:9_4: Sakavādī tathā abhāvato paṭikkhipati. Nanu pathavī atthi,
atk-abh03a20:9_5: atthi ca koci pathaviṁ pathavito samāpajjatīti pucchā sakavādissa .
atk-abh03a20:9_7: atthi ca koci taṁ pathaviṁ pathavitoyeva samāpajjati, na āpato vā tejato vāti.
atk-abh03a20:9_9: taṁ tathā samāpajjantassa ñāṇaṁ viparītaṁ hoti, nibbānaṁ atthi,
atk-abh03a20:9_10: tampi samāpajjantassa sabbavipariyesasamugghātanaṁ maggañāṇampi te viparītaṁ hotū’’ti dassanatthaṁ vuttanti.
atk-abh03a20:12_2: taṁ ‘‘bhabbo esa dhammaṁ abhisametu’’nti yasmā bhagavā jānāti,
atk-abh03a20:12_3: tasmā ‘‘aniyatassa puthujjanasseva sato puggalassa niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṁ atthī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a20:12_8: Yaṁ panassa ñāṇaṁ disvā bhagavā ‘‘bhabbo aya’’nti jānāti,
atk-abh03a20:13_0: Athassa sakavādī ayuttavāditaṁ dīpetuṁ niyatassāti viparītānuyogamāha.
atk-abh03a20:13_1: Tattha paṭhamapañhe maggena niyatassa aniyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṁ nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:13_3: Tatiye aniyatassa natthīti puṭṭhattā laddhivirodhena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:13_4: Puna paṭhamapañhameva catutthaṁ katvā niyatassa niyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a20:13_5: Tesu paṭhame yasmā ādimaggena niyatassa puna tadatthāya ñāṇaṁ natthi, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:13_8: Puna paṭhamapañhaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ katvā aniyatassa aniyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a20:13_10: Puna paṭhamapañhameva dvādasamaṁ katvā taṁmūlakā atthi niyāmotiādayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a20:13_11: Tattha yasmā niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṁ nāma maggañāṇameva hoti,
atk-abh03a20:13_12: tasmā taṁ sandhāya atthi niyāmoti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:13_13: Itaro pana niyāmoti vutte paṭikkhipati, ñāṇanti vutte paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a20:13_19: Tasmā iminā kāraṇena patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a20:16_3: sabbaṁ lokuttaramevā’’ti gahetvā ‘‘sabbaṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭisambhidā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a20:16_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:16_7: Ye keci sammutinti pañhe puthujjane sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:16_13: kiṁ sabbā sā paṭisambhidā’’ti pucchanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:16_14: Tenahi sabbaṁ ñāṇanti yasmā sabbā lokuttarapaññā paṭisambhidā ,
atk-abh03a20:16_15: tasmā sabbanti vacanaṁ sāmaññaphalena saddhiṁ patiṭṭhāpetīti.
atk-abh03a20:19_3: Ye pana evaṁ vibhāgaṁ akatvā saccanti vacanasāmaññena sammutiñāṇampi ‘‘saccārammaṇamevā’’ti vadanti, seyyathāpi andhakā;
atk-abh03a20:19_4: te ayuttavādinoti tesaṁ vādavisodhanatthaṁ ayaṁ kathā āraddhā.
atk-abh03a20:19_7: Sammutisaccamhīti sammutiṁ anupaviṭṭhe saccamhi. Paccatte vā bhummavacanaṁ, sammutisaccanti attho.
atk-abh03a20:19_8: Sammutiñāṇaṁ saccārammaṇaññevāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:19_10: tena ñāṇena dukkhapariññādīni kareyyā’’ti codetuṁ tena ñāṇenātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:22_2: Tattha cetopariyāye ñāṇanti vacanamattameva gahetvā ‘‘taṁ ñāṇaṁ cittārammaṇamevā’’ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a20:22_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:22_7: tasmā na vattabbaṁ taṁ cittārammaṇaññevā’’ti codanatthaṁ nanu atthi kocītiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:22_10: Puna phassārammaṇe ñāṇaṁ na vattabbanti puṭṭho phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṁ manasikaroto phassovārammaṇaṁ hotīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a20:22_11: Kiṁ panetaṁ phassapariyāye ñāṇanti puṭṭho pana tādisassa suttapadassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Idāni yaṁ nissāya laddhi,
atk-abh03a20:22_12: tadeva dassetvā laddhiṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ nanu cetopariyāye ñāṇantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:22_13: Sā panesā vacanamattābhinivesena patiṭṭhāpitāpi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a20:25_2: Tattha anāgataṁ nāma antarampi atthi, anantarampi.
atk-abh03a20:25_3: Tesu anantare ekanteneva ñāṇaṁ natthi. Yathā ca anantare,
atk-abh03a20:25_5: Tattha ye sabbasmimpi anāgate ñāṇaṁ icchanti, seyyathāpi andhakā;
atk-abh03a20:25_6: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:25_8: kiṁ tena anantaraṁ anāgataṁ mūlādivasena jānātī’’ti codetuṁ anāgataṁ mūlatotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:25_12: Tato ca taṁ hinoti pavattayatīti hetu.
atk-abh03a20:25_13: Tadeva taṁ nideti ‘‘handa naṁ gaṇhathā’’ti. Niyyāteti viyāti nidānaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:25_14: Tato taṁ sambhavatīti sambhavo. Pabhavatīti pabhavo. Tattha ca taṁ samuṭṭhāti,
atk-abh03a20:25_15: taṁ vā naṁ samuṭṭhāpetīti samuṭṭhānaṁ. Tadeva naṁ āharatīti āhāro.
atk-abh03a20:25_19: Yasmā pana anantaraṁ cittaṁ etehākārehi na sakkā jānituṁ,
atk-abh03a20:25_21: Anāgataṁ hetupaccayatanti yā anantarānāgate citte hetupaccayatā, taṁ jānāti.
atk-abh03a20:25_22: Ye tattha dhammā hetupaccayā honti, te jānātīti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a20:25_23: Gotrabhunotiādi yasmiṁ anāgate ñāṇaṁ na uppajjati, taṁ sarūpato dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:25_24: Pāṭaliputtassāti suttaṁ yasmiṁ anāgate ñāṇaṁ uppajjati, taṁ dassetuṁ āhaṭaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:25_25: Yasmā panetaṁ na sabbasmiṁ anāgate ñāṇassa sādhakaṁ; tasmā anāhaṭamevāti.
atk-abh03a20:28_2: Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccato diṭṭhesu tampi ñāṇaṁ aniccato diṭṭhaṁ hotī’’ti vacanaṁ nissāya ‘‘avisesena sabbasmiṁ paccuppanne ñāṇaṁ atthī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a20:28_3: te sandhāya paṭuppanneti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:28_4: Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi avisesena paṭuppanne ñāṇaṁ atthi,
atk-abh03a20:28_6: Evaṁ sante dvinnaṁ ñāṇānaṁ ekato abhāvā teneva ñāṇena taṁ jānitabbaṁ hotī’’ti codanatthaṁ tenāti anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a20:28_7: Tattha paṭhamapañhe teneva taṁ jānituṁ na sakkāti paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:28_9: Paṭipāṭito bhaṅgaṁ passanto bhaṅgānupassaneneva bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṁ passatīti adhippāyo.
atk-abh03a20:28_10: Tena ñāṇena taṁ ñāṇaṁ jānātītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a20:28_11: Tena phassena taṁ phassantiādīnissa lesokāsanivāraṇatthaṁ vuttāni .
atk-abh03a20:28_12: Yaṁ panetena laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṁ nanu sabbasaṅkhāretiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:28_13: Tattha nayato taṁ ñāṇaṁ diṭṭhaṁ hoti,
atk-abh03a20:28_15: Tasmā evaṁ patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti.
atk-abh03a20:31_2: Tattha ‘‘buddhāpi sattānaṁ ariyaphalappattiyā dhammaṁ desenti sāvakāpi,
atk-abh03a20:31_3: iti iminā sāmaññena buddhānaṁ viya sāvakānampi tena tena sattena pattabbe phale ñāṇaṁ atthī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a20:31_4: te sandhāya sāvakassāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:31_5: Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi sāvakassa phale ñāṇaṁ atthi,
atk-abh03a20:31_6: yathā buddhā samānepi sotāpattiphale attano ñāṇabalena ‘ayaṁ ekabījī, ayaṁ kolaṁkolo,
atk-abh03a20:31_8: kiṁ te evaṁ sāvakopī’’ti codetuṁ sāvako phalassa kataṁ paññapetīti āha. Itaro paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:32_0: Atthi sāvakassa phalaparopariyattītiādi phale ñāṇassa atthitāya paccayapucchanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:32_2: idaṁ opara’’nti evaṁ phalānaṁ uccāvacabhāvajānanasaṅkhātā phale paropariyatti nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a20:32_4: tāsaṁ atthitāya tassa tassa puggalassa tesaṁ tesaṁ indriyānaṁ vasena taṁ taṁ phalaṁ jānanti,
atk-abh03a20:32_5: kiṁ te sāvakassāpi etā paropariyattiyo atthīti.
atk-abh03a20:33_0: Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññattītiādīnipi ‘‘yadi te sāvakassa buddhānaṁ viya phale ñāṇaṁ atthi,
atk-abh03a20:33_1: imā hi pissa paññattīhi bhavitabbaṁ. Kimassa tā atthi,
atk-abh03a20:33_2: sakkoti so etā paññattiyo attano balena jānituṁ vā paññapetuṁ vā’’ti codanatthaṁ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a20:33_3: Sāvako jinotiādi ‘‘yadi sāvakassa buddhānaṁ viya phale ñāṇaṁ atthi,
atk-abh03a20:33_4: evaṁ sante sveva jino’’ti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:33_6: Aññāṇīti pañhe avijjāsaṅkhātassa aññāṇassa vihatattā paṭikkhitto,
atk-abh03a20:33_7: na panassa buddhānaṁ viya phale ñāṇaṁ atthi.
